content: कंकः {@--1@} A heron. {@--2@} A variety of mango. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of Yama. {@--4@} A Kṣatriya. {@--5@} A Vṛ hṇi. {@--6@} A false or pretended Brāhmaṇa. {@--7@} Name assumed by Yudhiṣṭhira in the palace of Virāṭa. {@--8@} One of the 18 divisions of the continent. {@--9@} <ab>N.</ab> of a people (<ab>pl.</ab>) --का {@--1@} A sort of sandal. {@--2@} Scent of the lotus.
